dcterms:description: The TADPOLE Challenge dataset consists of data collected from 1628 subjects, including those who are cognitively normal, stable mild cognitive impairment, early mild cognitive impairment, late mild cognitive impairment, or have Alzheimer's disease. The data was collected over a 10-year period with measurements typically taken every six months, and it is used to predict changes in ventricular volume over time.
dcterms:title: TADPOLE Challenge Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sean M Nestor
Raul Rupsingh
Michael Borrie
Matthew Smith
Vittorio Accomazzi
Jennie L Wells
Jennifer Fogarty
Robert Bartha
dcterms:description: The Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) dataset is used to predict the change in ventricular volume over time, which is linked to Alzheimer's disease progression. It includes various biomarkers and clinical assessments collected from participants over time.
dcterms:title: Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) Dataset

dcterms:description: The Electricity Consumption Dataset contains monthly electricity consumption data across the United States for individual states, including features such as population count, price of electricity, and average temperature. It is used to forecast electricity consumption over time.
dcterms:title: Electricity Consumption Dataset

dcterms:description: NOAA’s National Centers for Environmental Information dataset provides average temperature data across the United States, which is used in conjunction with other features to forecast electricity consumption.
dcterms:title: NOAA’s National Centers for Environmental Information Dataset
